noise.description: Long term average speech spectrum noise for HINT
noise.name: HINT

speechtoken.text: She's drinking from her own cup.
She's washing her new silk dress.
She spoke to her eldest son.
She uses her spoon to eat.
They met some friends at dinner.
He took the dogs for a walk.
They had some cold cuts for lunch.
She found her purse in (a/the) trash.
It's time to go to bed.
He played with his toy train.
He got mud on his shoes.
She took off her fur coat.
She cut (a/the) steak with her knife.
She injured four of her fingers.
He paid his bill in full.
He's washing his face with soap.
The paint dripped on the ground.
His father will come home soon.
They broke all the brown eggs.
Dad stopped to pick some pears.
She made her bed and left.
She bumped here head on (a/the) door.
The leaves turned brown and dry.
He closed his eyes and jumped.
She writes to her friend daily.
